about.about-description: Hello there, my name is Luis Fernando Villacorta Loarte, I am a passionate and learning the development of the world of Technology. I am currently studying Software Development, daily I learn and put into practice my learning through the realization of projects.

banner.banner-subtitle: Do you want to work with me?

projects.projects-portfolio-description: I have been very motivated to work on this project because it is a 'letter of introduction' on my part to the working world and it brings together all my acquired knowledge.
projects.projects-gestion-veterinaria-description: One of my first projects developed with React and Tailwind CSS, it manages appointments and patient information.

contact.contact-form-title: Do you have any project to work on together?
contact.contact-message: ¡Great!, your message has been sent successfully, I will reply as soon as possible, see you soon.
